name: Chair Squats

instructions.description: Stand in front of a sturdy chair with your feet hip-width apart.
Slowly lower your body down towards the chair as if you are about to sit, keeping your chest up and core engaged.
Pause briefly when your glutes touch the chair, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

commentsNotes: Ensure the chair is stable and placed on a non-slip surface.
Keep your knees aligned with your toes during the movement.
Avoid arching your back by engaging your core muscles.
If you experience knee pain, reduce the depth of the squat.
